features.title: Create HTML entry point with Phaser 3 CDN
features.description: Create index.html that loads Phaser 3 from CDN, sets up centered canvas with black background, loads game JS as ES6 modules

features.title: Create Phaser game configuration
features.description: Create js/game.js with 800x600 canvas, Arcade physics (no gravity), scene registration

features.title: Create game constants configuration
features.description: Create js/config.js with CONFIG object containing all game constants (speeds, rates, sizes, colors)

features.title: Create BootScene with placeholder sprites
features.description: Create js/scenes/BootScene.js that generates colored rectangle placeholders for all entities

features.title: Create PlayScene with basic setup
features.description: Create js/scenes/PlayScene.js with placeholder sprite, arrow key input logging, physics confirmation

features.title: Create GameOverScene placeholder
features.description: Create js/scenes/GameOverScene.js with Game Over text and SPACE to restart

features.title: Create Wasp entity class with movement
features.description: Create js/entities/Wasp.js extending Phaser.Physics.Arcade.Sprite with momentum-based movement, drag, max velocity

features.title: Implement floaty momentum physics
features.description: Implement acceleration (300 px/sec^2), drag (100), max velocity (200 px/sec), diagonal movement support

features.title: Add speed penalty system for worms
features.description: Track wormsCarried, reduce max velocity by WASP_WORM_SPEED_PENALTY per worm, minimum velocity 50

features.title: Setup camera follow system
features.description: Configure camera to follow wasp with lerp 0.1, set world bounds, create debug text display

features.title: Create NestGenerator system
features.description: Create js/systems/NestGenerator.js with room data structure (id, position, size, type, depth, connections)

features.title: Implement queen chamber creation
features.description: Create queen's chamber at world center with type 'queen', depth 0, large room size

features.title: Implement recursive room expansion
features.description: Add corridors in 4 directions with BRANCH_PROBABILITY (60%), decreasing with depth, max depth 5

features.title: Create corridor and room placement
features.description: Create corridors (64px wide, 100-200px long) and rooms (200-400px) with overlap detection

features.title: Add worm spawn point placement
features.description: Calculate worm count per room based on depth, no worms in queen chamber

features.title: Generate tilemap with collision
features.description: Convert room data to Phaser tilemap, create wall/floor layers, set collision on walls

features.title: Integrate NestGenerator in PlayScene
features.description: Use NestGenerator, set world bounds from generated nest, add wasp-wall collision

features.title: Create Queen entity with hunger system
features.description: Create js/entities/Queen.js with hunger property (0-100), drain rate, feed zone

features.title: Implement hunger bar UI
features.description: Create bar above queen - green >50%, yellow 25-50%, red <25%, shows percentage

features.title: Create Worm collectible entity
features.description: Create js/entities/Worm.js with physics body, wiggle animation, collect method

features.title: Implement worm collection mechanic
features.description: Wasp overlaps worm -> destroy worm, increment wormsCarried, update UI

features.title: Implement queen feeding mechanic
features.description: Wasp overlaps queen with worms -> transfer all, restore hunger, visual feedback

features.title: Implement game over on starvation
features.description: Queen hunger <= 0 triggers queenDied event, transition to GameOverScene

features.title: Spawn queen and worms in PlayScene
features.description: Create queen in queen chamber, spawn worms at spawn points, create UI overlay

features.title: Create Hornet entity with AI states
features.description: Create js/entities/Hornet.js with FSM: PATROL, CHASE, RETURN states

features.title: Implement patrol behavior
features.description: Move back/forth in room, random direction, reverse at boundaries, 80 px/sec

features.title: Implement chase behavior
features.description: Trigger on detection (150px), move toward wasp at 120 px/sec, 5 second timeout

features.title: Implement return behavior
features.description: Return to home position at 100 px/sec, transition to patrol when near

features.title: Implement detection system
features.description: Distance check each frame, 150px radius, only detect if wasp in same room

features.title: Implement collision and worm drop
features.description: Wasp hits hornet -> drop all worms scattered, 1.5s invincibility, hornet returns

features.title: Add wasp invincibility system
features.description: Add invincible flag to Wasp, flashing effect, 1.5 second duration

features.title: Spawn hornets in PlayScene
features.description: Spawn 1-2 hornets per room based on depth, not in queen chamber, set up collisions

features.title: Create DifficultyManager system
features.description: Create js/systems/DifficultyManager.js tracking elapsed time, difficulty level, scaling values

features.title: Implement scoring system
features.description: Score = survival seconds, display as MM:SS, pass to GameOverScene

features.title: Implement difficulty scaling triggers
features.description: Every 45s: increase hunger drain +0.5%/sec, spawn hornet, reduce worm respawn chance

features.title: Implement dynamic hornet spawning
features.description: On difficulty increase, spawn new hornet in random non-queen room, max 20

features.title: Implement worm respawning
features.description: Check every 10s, chance to respawn at empty spawn points, chance decreases with difficulty

features.title: Complete GameOverScene implementation
features.description: Display final score, death reason, high score (localStorage), restart via SPACE/click

features.title: Create wasp sprite sheet (32x32, 4 frames)
features.description: Yellow body, black stripes, translucent wings, top-down view, wing flutter animation

features.title: Create queen sprite sheet (64x64, 4 frames)
features.description: Larger body, crown marking, breathing animation, regal centered posture

features.title: Create hornet sprite sheet (32x32, 4 frames)
features.description: Brown/orange body, angry expression, patrol and chase animation variants

features.title: Create worm sprite sheet (16x16, 4 frames)
features.description: Pink segmented body, dot eyes, wiggle animation

features.title: Create wall and floor tile sprites
features.description: 16x16 honeycomb pattern tiles, wall amber/brown, floor darker, seamless tiling

features.title: Update BootScene for sprite loading
features.description: Load sprite sheets, create animations (wasp-fly, queen-idle, hornet-patrol/chase, worm-wiggle)

features.title: Integrate animations in entities
features.description: Play animations in Wasp, Queen, Hornet, Worm constructors, switch hornet animation on state

features.title: Create TitleScene with title image
features.description: Load wasp-the-game.png as background, add start prompt, display high score

features.title: Add sound effects
features.description: Load and play buzz, pickup, feed, hit, alert, gameover sounds at appropriate triggers

features.title: Add screen shake effects
features.description: Camera shake on hornet hit (0.01, 200ms), difficulty increase (0.005, 100ms)

features.title: Add particle effects
features.description: Sparkles on worm collection, hearts on queen feeding, create particle emitters

features.title: Add background music
features.description: Ambient hive loop, tension music at low hunger, cross-fade between tracks

features.title: Polish UI elements
features.description: Pulsing hunger bar when low, worm icons, pop animations on value changes
